channel.title: Ron Kaufman
channel.description: Ron Kaufman Advisor, Romney Ryan Campaign (Remarks as Prepared for Delivery)

item.title: A friend who founded Staples with Mitt Romney once said to me, "The great thing about Mitt Romney is that he makes everyone who is around him greater than they were!"
item.author: Ron Kaufman

item.title: One of the folks that Mitt Romney brought in to help save the Salt Lake Olympics told me, "Every day on the way to work, you would say to yourself ­ that you owed it to Mitt to be better today than you were yesterday!"
item.author: Ron Kaufman

item.title: If ever there was a time that Americans need to be inspired to be better today than yesterday, that time is now.
item.author: Ron Kaufman

item.title: If ever there was a time that we needed someone to inspire us to do great things, that time is now!
item.author: Ron Kaufman

item.title: Today we come together as a party to nominate for president a man who will energize and inspire this country.
item.author: Ron Kaufman

item.title: The time has come for a new day in America.
item.author: Ron Kaufman

item.title: One with more freedom, one filled with more opportunities and jobs, and a lot less debt.
item.author: Ron Kaufman

item.title: That time and that man have met!
item.author: Ron Kaufman

item.title: That man is Mitt Romney! I have the incredible honor of seconding the nomination for Mitt Romney as the next President of the United States!
item.author: Ron Kaufman
